item.title: Darian Mclaren
item.description: I graduated from Brandon University with a BSc in 2019 with a double major in both mathematics and physics. After taking a year off I started my MMath degree in applied mathematics (with a focus on quantum information) in the fall of 2020. I am jointly supervised by Dr. Joel Wallman, Prof.
